title: Math
description: Applications of mathematics in problem solving, finance, probability, statistics, geometry, population growth.

title: English
description: General English and Intensive English courses are designed to help students make rapid progress in English

title: Science
description: This lesson will emphasize the development of basic scientific skills and concepts in chemistry, physics, earth science and biology.

title: Programming
description: This lesson will introduce the fundamental concepts of structured programming.

title: Geology
description: Explore the wonders of the Earth with these geology science experiments. Investigate rocks, minerals, and geological processes.

title: History
description: A lesson where students analyze historical evidence in order to form and test hypotheses about past events.

title: Drawing
description: During this activity, students explore different types of mark-making using pencils and crayons

title: Music
description: Music units with five lesson plans each, online teaching guidance, supporting resources and full curriculum coverage, skills progression.

title: Sports
description: This lesson includes sports such as football and basketball and other competitive leisure activities which need physical effort and skill.

title: Martial Arts
description: Martial arts training for kids will boost self-confidence, fitness and teaches important life skills and values.

title: Foreign Languages
description: This lesson will help you immerse your foreign language students into fascinating cultures and make their language learning more meaningful.

title: Cooking
description: In this hands-on class, you'll learn how to chop, slice, and dice like a pro.
